entries.journal_entry_description: After your battle with the acklay in Borvo's vault, you found an intact portion of its shell.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Looks like you have managed to get another carapace. You should take it back to Dakk.
entries.task00_message_box_text: You once again managed to extract an intact piece of the acklay's shell. Dakk might be able to craft you another piece, bring it to him.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Dakk can make you another piece if you bring it to him.
